law.catch_line: Independent district in city may convey property to city to provide buildings.
law.text: To provide buildings for school purposes, boards of education of school districts embracing a city of any class may convey to the city a fee simple title with covenant of general warranty to a site now held or hereafter acquired by the boards of education.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 253, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4421-1.
